title: CoiRabbit
author: CoiRabbit
content: We are happy to introduce you new feature in our crypto-backed loan service - get up to 90% LTV.Let your crypto work! Access extra funds without selling your crypto, btc, eth and others. Get money instantly against your crypto from CoinRabbit. Your cryptocurrency should work for you right now. Without waiting for the rate to rise to the desired level, without fear of losing it. We have created a solution that allows you to borrow crypto quickly and safely. Simply the best non-custodial cryptocurrency exchange service. Expand your customer offering, get additional income, engage your userbase, we will do the rest â€“ with our easily integrated and streamlined crypto loan flow. Set up your loan using different collateral options, then confirm it with a phone and your payout address where you want to receive funds.Get up to 90% of your collateral in crypto or in fiat. Optimize taxes, make a huge purchase or reinvest them - it's up to you. Instant approval, unlimited loan term and 24/7 customer support.We are happy to provide our users with easy and useful service - https://go.coinrabbit.io/bitcointalk
